description:
Powerful text editing tool

Powerful text editing tool with syntax highlighting support for programming languages and scripts, multi-caret and synchronized editing, code/text folding, over 600 options for customizing, over 100 ready made skins, ChatGPT, spell checker, image/PDF view, Markdown/RTF/SVG preview, character map, numerical unit convert tool, text compare, JSON/SQL/XML formatter, support for multiple directories (also SFTP) and search results, etc.
- Added auto simple editor mode options (Options > Editor > File)
- Added Czech language by Karel Cíž
- Added JSON to XML converter
- Added sidebar menu (View > Sidebar menu)
- Added simple editor mode (for large files)
- Added XML to JSON converter
- Fixed about dialog
- Fixed AI Chat options
- Fixed AlphaSkins - https://www.alphaskins.com/
- Fixed application icon
- Fixed code folding
- Fixed drag and drop files
- Fixed encoding change
- Fixed favourite
- Fixed file reload
- Fixed image view options
- Fixed language files
- Fixed large file issues
- Fixed main menu
- Fixed options
- Fixed page control
- Fixed PDFium control - https://github.com/TextEditorPro/TPDFiumControl
- Fixed scaling issues
- Fixed svg preview
- Fixed text compare
- Fixed text editor control - https://github.com/TextEditorPro/TTextEditor
- Fixed text search
- Fixed title bar
- Fixed Windows ARM emulation issues
- Refactored ChatGPT to AI Chat
- Refactored image view
- Updated DelphiOpenAI - https://github.com/HemulGM/DelphiOpenAI
- Updated Drag and Drop Component Suite - https://github.com/andersmelander/Drag-and-Drop-Component-Suite
- Updated FastMM5 memory manager - https://github.com/pleriche/FastMM5
- Updated Graphics32 library - https://github.com/graphics32/graphics32
- Updated Image32 library - https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Image32
- Updated Inno Setup 6.5.3 - https://jrsoftware.org/
- Updated PDFium 142.0.7415.0 binaries (DLL files) - https://github.com/bblanchon/pdfium-binaries
- Updated SVGIconImageList 4.5.0 - https://github.com/EtheaDev/SVGIconImageList

Note! This product is always completely FREE for you. See the license.
